text: Mandy Moore net worth and salary: Mandy Moore is a New Hampshire-born actress, singer-songwriter, and designer who has a net worth of $10 million. Mandy Moore first became a household name as a singer, releasing three pop influenced albums that made her a hit with teen audiences. In the early 2000's she launched a film career with roles in such films as A Walk to Remember, Chasing Liberty, and more recently, the cartoon, Tangled, as the voice of Rapunzel, and as the love interest of Vincent Chase in the HBO hit show, Entourage. She was born on April 10, 1984 in Nashua, New Hampshire and was raised in Florida. She rocketed to fame in the 1990s with the release of several teen-oriented pop albums, including So Real (debuted at Number 31 on the Billboard Top 200) … I Wanna Be With You and Mandy Moore. In 2005, she branched out from music and film when she began her own fashion line, Mblem. a brand of contemporary knitwear and cashmere. One of her aims was to provide clothing for taller women as she herself stands 5 feet 10 inches tall. Mandy Moore remains exceptionally busy and is also a committed philanthropist, working tirelessly for causes related to Africa and its people. Moore is the ambassador for the UN Foundations's Nothing But Nets malaria prevention campaign and is also the spokesperson for Dove's self-esteem movement and the "Women who should be famous" campaign. Moore became engaged to singer-songwriter Ryan Adams in February 2009, and they were married on March 10, 2009, in Savannah, Georgia. In 2015, Mandy and Ryan announced they were getting divorced. Mandy has starred on the smash hit NBC show This Is Us since 2016. Her salary per episode as of 2018 is $250,000.
